overview: This very special edition of the seminal series dedicated to the very best in IR sex, features all scenes directed by AVN Director of the Year, Kayden Kross! Cover model Riley Steele, in an exclusive and first IR performance plays a bride getting cold feet the morning of her wedding. Also featuring the inspired performances by Katrina Jade, Jesse Jane (exclusive, first IR) and Ava Addams.
title: Black & White 16
